formatDescription: An ESRI file geodatabase is a collection of files in a folder on disk that can store, query, and manage both spatial and nonspatial data.The GeoDB is the primary data storage model for ArcGIS.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
formatProvenance: Unfortunately we are currently unable to use PRONOM to be able to develop a signature to identify this format, hopefully in the future this functionality will be available.
